alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.6
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Beta 1.6 for Tweeten!

As you may know, TweetDeck recently introduced a seamless login experience for its web app. Unfortunately, the update prevented new Tweeten users from logging into TweetDeck. Today, we are releasing Beta 1.6 to address the issue.

Thanks everyone for the patience! Oh, if you are coming from TweetDeck for Windows, welcome! We have a bunch of exciting things coming in the future!

Make sure to let us know if you have any feedback about Tweeten via Twitter (We are @TweetenApp on Twitter) or Slack.
